title: Trouble of purchasing RP
body:
I am trying to send rp as gift to my friend. And the last step, when i paid by my card it shows"please do not close the window while it processing. In rare cases it can take up to 30 minutes for accounts to be credited". I already waited 40mins so I closed the window try again but it shows the same.
Should I still wait or just close the window. I am waiting other 30 minutes already. It waste my time!!

replies.body:
Hey there,

Are you still experiencing this issue?
